meanings.definition: The quality of being alive or having the ability to move.
meanings.sent1: The animatenesses of the forest creatures brought the woods to life.
meanings.sent2: The children were fascinated by the animatenesses of their toys.
meanings.sent3: The animatenesses of the dancing flowers made the garden a magical place.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the animatenesses of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The animatenesses of the roaring lion left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The state of being animated or lively.
meanings.sent1: The animatenesses of the party filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: His speech was full of animatenesses that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The animatenesses of the cartoon characters made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: The animatenesses of the city streets at night gave a sense of energy.
meanings.sent5: The animatenesses of the music made everyone want to dance.
